attributes.action: Make a Law for Organic & Plant-based foods to be sold cheaper than alternatives
attributes.additional_details:
Make a NEW LAW for ‘organic’, ‘ethically produced’ ‘plant-based food’ to be sold cheaper than all the processed chemical filled, cancer causing alternatives in all the supermarkets!?!

By doing so you would be making ‘eating healthy’ accessible to everyone! Which in turn will REALLY help combat CLIMATE CHANGE, help take the strain off the NHS - if more people could afford to feed their family organic plant based then there would be an epidemic of healthy people; less with CANCER, less OBESE!
attributes.background: FACTS: You claim to be tackling CLIMATE CHANGE, you say the NHS is OVER USED with LIMITED STAFF; you claim to be tackling Britain’s OBESITY issues. By creating this New Law you can tackle all three issues!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is the responsibility of supermarkets, not the UK Government or Parliament.
